doc.name: ActorWithPortNameProblem
doc.description: An actor that has spaces in the port name.
doc.author: Christopher Brooks
doc.port: The input port. This base class imposes no type constraints except that the type of the input cannot be greater than the type of the output.
The multoport input port. This base class imposes no type constraints except that the type of the input cannot be greater than the type of the output.
The output port. By default, the type of this output is constrained to be at least that of the input.
